translations: n.男性人鱼；擅长游泳的男子
n.（Merman）人名；（俄）梅尔曼；（英）默尔曼

phrs.translation: 艾索尔·摩曼, 埃塞尔·默尔曼
人鱼战士, 鱼人战士

sentences.sentence: Emiliana Torrini covered "I Really Loved Harold" on her 1996 "Merman" album.
sentences.translation: 埃米莉安娜·托里尼在其1996年的“人鱼”专辑中演唱了“我真的很爱哈罗德”。

sentences.sentence: The mermaid and merman legends begin with the worship of god as have many mythologies.
sentences.translation: 如同众多神话一样，关于雌性和雄性美人鱼的传奇故事始于天神崇拜。

sentences.sentence: Thee mermaid and merman legends begin with the worship of gods, as have many 4 mythologies.
sentences.translation: 如同众多神话一样，关于雌性和雄性美人鱼的传奇故事始于天神崇拜。
